entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:17 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
